channel.title: Password

item.title: Password
item.dc:creator: @dude1332 dude1332
item.description:
@dude1332 wrote:

well when you type your username in my client you see this | blinking.

then when you click the password or just press enter there isnt a “|”

And people are complaining about it because they are to dumb to type…

here is the code

} aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "@blu@Username :" + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "@blu@Password :" + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "xxx|" : ""), j)
